name: Imminent (zetachan, PipeFlowWizard, chrysoulaskalkogiannis, drouba, ynottony105, beesinatrenchcoat)
name_original: Imminent (zetachan, PipeFlowWizard, chrysoulaskalkogiannis, drouba, ynottony105, beesinatrenchcoat)
description: Imminent is a card game with a grid covering mechanism that simulates managing one's personal schedule while studying isolated in a spaceship. The player must add cards to their deck and avoid anxiety to keep their motivation high and reach a passing grade.
